job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongPurpose of PositionsstrongppWorks on a team developing testing debugging and supporting new software or enhancements to existing software in support of a very complex business modelnbspRole includes meeting with customers to understand their business processes and needs with the objective of determining solutions to support the businessnbspThis will sometimes require filling multiple roles to turn the customers needs into actual solutionsnbspTakes initiative owns issues from start to finish proactive communicator Daily activities include typical software development activities developing testing debugging supportingppstrongGeneral Tasks and ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliSoftware analysis activities for new software or enhancements to existing software to include providing high level estimates based on limited information in support of the project governance processliliSoftware development activities for new software or enhancements to existing softwareliliSupport of new and existing softwareliliInteractioncommunication with business users regarding requirements design reviews prototype presentations etc This position may or may not manage employees based on location of incumbentliulpstrongEducationstrongppBachelors in Computer ScienceppstrongCertifications and LicensesstrongppstrongYears of Experiencestrongpp03 years of experienceppstrongCore CompetenciesstrongppAdaptabilityppCollaborationppStrives for Positive ResultsppServiceOrientedp
